text: to jab (yudhd mein) bhid jao kaafiron se, to gardan udao, yahaan tak ki jab kuchal do unhen, to unhen drdhata se baandho. phir usake baad ya to upakaar karake chhod do ya arthadand lekar. yahaan tak ki yudhd apane hathiyaar rakh de.[1] ye aadesh hai aur yadi allaah chaahata, to svayan unase badala le leta. kintu, (ye aadesh isalie diya) taaki tumhaaree ek-doosare dvaara pareeksha le aur jo maar diye gaye allaah kee raah mein, to vah kadaapi vyarth nahin karega unake karmon ko
